data.description: 고자 means eunuch. The word became popular after the line 내가 고자라니 from the TV show 야인시대.
data.exampleSentence:
아니 내가 고자라니!
(No way I'm a eunuch!)

data.description: 더럽게 literally means dirty. Commonly used as an intensifier, and is used mostly by younger generations.
data.exampleSentence:
진짜 너 더럽게 못생겼다
(You are REALLY ugly)

data.description: 꼴초/골초 is used commonly to refer to a heavy smoker
data.exampleSentence:
쟤는 군대 갔다 오더니 꼴초가 됐어
(He became a heavy smoker after serving in the military)

data.definition: a person with outdated mindset with an aggressive attitude
data.description: 꼰대 is usually older and in a higher social hierarchy who impose on others because they think they are always right.
data.exampleSentence:
우리 사장은 완전 꼰대야
(Our boss is a grumpy fogey)

data.description: 노(no)답(solution) is used to refer to a situation/people where it/they can't be solved/helped
data.exampleSentence:
지금 상황이 진짜 노답이야
(We're in a really bad situation right now)

data.definition: someone who doesn't think or acts dumb
data.description: 무(doesn't exist)뇌(brain) is used when someone who acts or talks like he does not have a brain.
The word 변태 is often used to tease people. Used often in a not serious situation.
This word is the exact same word as the english word psycho.
This word can be used to describe someone who is rebellious, a punk, wannabe gangsta, player, bully etc.
data.exampleSentence:
너 남친 완전 양아치더라
(Your boyfriend is a real punk)

data.description: This word is used to express something of poor quality or someone who has low skill level
data.exampleSentence:
너 신발이 좀 허접해 보인다
(Your shoes look a little trash)

data.description: 극혐 is short for 극한(extreme) 혐오(hatred). Commonly used even if the hatred is not extreme.
data.exampleSentence:
아 먹으면서 쩝쩝거리는거 극혐이야
(I hate when people chew with their moth open)

data.description: 똥개 literally means amutt, but it is often used to call someone stupid in an endearing way.
